items.value:
There is currently not much to do with me!
But you can help the Gang, they always need:

1x Cocaine Baggie
5x Ganja Baggie
5x Ecstasy Baggie

If you got the Stuff you will get:
€ 450
i have the Stuff with me!
i will be back in a bit!

You are so fast every time!

I need to talk to my boss, maybe we'll pay you more soon! We need reliable members like you!

Take care and come back when you have so much again!

Sorry but you misunderstood me!
Only if you have..

1x Cocaine Baggie
5x Ganja Baggie
5x Ecstasy Baggie

in your Inventory, I can give you € 450!
